match.headline: France loses to Senegal
match.story: The 1998 World Cup Champion France lost the opening game to Senegal. It was Senegal's first appearance in a World Cup. This was a stunning upset for France. The team was playing without one of the stars, Zidane.

match.headline: USA Wins
match.story: The USA team upsets Portugal in its first game in Round 1 of the World Cup. The score was 3 to 2. Portugal was considered a superior team. This means that the USA will not finish last as it did in the previous outing.
